dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev just held a meeting with the National Security Committee, and they showed him some pretty advanced cybersecurity capabilities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev just held a meeting with the National Security Committee, and they showed him some pretty advanced cybersecurity capabilities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held a meeting with the leadership of the National Security Committee (NSC), citing Akorda. The President was shown the agency's capabilities in ensuring cybersecurity, as well as projects related to the development of government and secure communications and artificial intelligence technologies, the Akorda press service stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he really stressed the importance of countering information security threats, which, you know, is such a huge issue these days.

dialogue_turns.text: That's interesting. It sounds like he's taking a very hands-on approach to national security.
